trans-unit.source: Provides host for workflow-based services.
Implements the host used by the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] service model programming model.
trans-unit.target: 實作 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 服務模型程式設計模型 (Programming Model) 使用的主機。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost> class to configure and expose a workflow as service for use by client applications when you are not using Internet Information Services (IIS) or Windows Activation Services (WAS) to expose a service.
trans-unit.target: 當您不使用網際網路資訊服務 (IIS) 或 Windows Activation Services (WAS) 來公開服務的時候，請使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost> 類別，將工作流程做為服務加以設定和公開，以供用戶端應用程式使用。

trans-unit.source: Both IIS and WAS interact with a <xref:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost> object on your behalf.
trans-unit.target: IIS 和 WAS 都會代表您與 <xref:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost> 物件進行互動。

trans-unit.source: To expose a workflow as service for use by callers, WCF requires a complete service description (represented by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription> class).
trans-unit.target: 若要將工作流程當做服務來公開以供呼叫端使用，WCF 必須有完整的服務描述 (由 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription> 類別表示)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost> class creates a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription> from the workflow service type and configuration information and then uses that description to create <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher> objects for each endpoint in the description.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost> 類別會從工作流程服務類型及組態資訊建立 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription>，然後使用這個描述來為描述中的每個端點建立 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Use a <xref:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost> object to load a workflow service, configure endpoints, apply security settings, and start listeners to handle incoming requests.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost> 物件，載入工作流程服務、設定端點、套用安全性設定及啟動接聽項處理傳入要求。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost" /> class.
<see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> that contains the workflow definition.
An array of type <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> that contains the base addresses for the hosted service.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost" /> class using a byte stream that contains the workflow definition and the base addresses of the service specified.
Use this overload if the workflow definition is stored in secured storage, such as a database.
trans-unit.target: 若工作流程定義儲存在安全的儲存區中 (如資料庫)，則使用此多載。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the path to the workflow definition file.
An array of type <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> that contains the base addresses for the hosted service.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost" /> class using a path to the workflow definition and the base addresses of the service specified.
Use this overload when the workflow definition is in the form of windows file.
trans-unit.target: 當工作流程定義是 Windows 檔案形式，則使用此多載。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the workflow instance.
An array of type <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> that contains the base addresses for the hosted service.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost" /> class using a workflow type and the base addresses of the service specified.
Use this overload when the workflow is defined as compiled type.
trans-unit.target: 當工作流程定義為編譯型別，則使用此多載。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> that contains the workflow definition.
<see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> that contains the workflow rules definition.
An array of type <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> that contains the base addresses for the hosted service.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost" /> class using a byte stream that contains the workflow definition, a byte stream that contains the workflow rules definition, and the base addresses of the service specified.
Use this overload when the workflow definition and rules definition are stored in secured storage, such as a database.
trans-unit.target: 若工作流程定義與規則定義儲存在安全的儲存區中 (如資料庫)，則使用此多載。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the path to the workflow definition file.
A string that contains the path to the workflow rules definition file.
An array of type <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> that contains the base addresses for the hosted service.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost" /> class using a path to the workflow definition, a path to the workflow rules definition, and the base addresses of the service specified.
Use this overload when the workflow definition and rules definition are in the form of windows files.
trans-unit.target: 當工作流程定義與規則定義是 Windows 檔案形式，則使用此多載。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> that contains the workflow definition.
<see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> that contains the workflow rules definition.
A type provider that implements the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ITypeProvider" /> interface.
An array of type <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> that contains the base addresses for the hosted service.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost" /> class using a byte stream that contains the workflow definition, a byte stream that contains the workflow rules definition, a type provider for custom activity types, and the base addresses of the service specified.
Use this overload when your compiled workflow references custom types defined in a separate assembly.
trans-unit.target: 當您編譯的工作流程參照到其他組件中定義的自訂型別時，請使用此多載。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the path to the workflow definition file.
A string that contains the path to the workflow rules definition file.
A type provider that implements the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ITypeProvider" /> interface.
An array of type <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> that contains the base addresses for the hosted service.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost" /> class using a path to the workflow definition, a path to the workflow rules definition, a type provider for custom activity types, and the base addresses of the service specified.
Use this overload when you have your workflow defined in a workflow markup file (.xoml) and it references custom types defined in a separate assembly.
trans-unit.target: 當您將工作流程定義在工作流程標記檔中 (.xoml)，且它參照到其他組件中定義的自訂型別時，請使用此多載。

trans-unit.source: Adds a service endpoint to the hosted service.
The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of contract for the endpoint added.
The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding" /> for the endpoint added.
The address for the endpoint added.
Adds a service endpoint for the workflow service using the specified contract, binding, and endpoint address.
The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" /> added to the workflow service.
<paramref name="address" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The workflow service does not implement <paramref name="implementedContract" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of contract for the endpoint added.
The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding" /> for the endpoint added.
The <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> that contains the address for the endpoint added.
Adds a service endpoint to the workflow service with a specified contract, binding, and URI that contains the endpoint address.
The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" /> added to the workflow service.
<paramref name="address" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The workflow service does not implement <paramref name="implementedContract" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of contract for the endpoint added.
The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding" /> for the endpoint added.
The endpoint address for the service.
The <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> on which the service endpoints can listen.
Adds a service endpoint to the workflow service with a specified contract, a binding, an endpoint address, and a URI on which the service listens.
The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" /> added to the workflow service.
<paramref name="address" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ServiceContractAttribute" /> not specified for <paramref name="implementedContract" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of contract for the endpoint added.
The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding" /> for the endpoint added.
The <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> that contains the address for the endpoint added.
The <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> on which the service endpoints can listen.
Adds a service endpoint to the workflow service with a specified contract, a binding, a URI that contains the endpoint address, and a URI on which the service listens.
The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" /> added to the workflow service.
<paramref name="address" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ServiceContractAttribute" /> not specified for <paramref name="implementedContract" />.
When this method returns, the <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" /> object contains the keyed-contracts of the hosted service that have been implemented.
Creates a description of the workflow service.
A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription" /> of the workflow service.
This method is called before the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost" /> is put into a closing state.

In the default implementation, <xref:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost> calls <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StopRuntime%2A> before calling <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CommunicationObject.OnClosing%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 在預設實作中，呼叫 <xref:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost> 前，<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StopRuntime%2A> 會先呼叫 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CommunicationObject.OnClosing%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: This means the workflow runtime will shut down before the service host closes.
trans-unit.target: 這表示服務主機關閉前，會先關閉工作流程執行階段。
